title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal website where I share my projects, photography, and blog, along with fun facts that show my personality and passions.

title: Scriptly
description: Schedule, run, and organize scripts on your machine. Easily interact with your scripts via the Scriptly Desktop App and keep track of their results with the built in logging capabilities.

title: Home Media App
description: An all-in-one home media app where users can organize, track, and discover their movies, TV shows, books, comics, and other favorite media

title: Gameboy Emulator
description: Play all your favorite old school gameboy games on modern hardware with this Gameboy Emulator
